attributes.action: Ensure non skid paint is used for all UK road markings an dpathways
attributes.additional_details: Britain is constantly affected by bad weather and the roads are wet in London for approximately 145 days a year. Cycling on wet painted pathways and lines leads to a considerable amount of cyclist accidents or near misses every year purely as a result of man made dangers caused by slippery road paintings. With technology as it is and an ever increasing number of cyclists on the roads, it should be a  legal requirement for councils to ensure ALL painted pathways and markings are completed with non Slip (Grip) paints.
